newsitem.title: USA: Arbatax to acquire private Swiss Bank.
newsitem.headline: Arbatax to acquire private Swiss Bank.

text.p: Arbatax International Inc said on Friday it has agreed to acquire all of the shares of a private, full-service Swiss bank for about US$20 million, about the equivalent of the bank's net book value.
The name of the bank was not immediately available.
The bank provides a full range of financial services to high net-worth individuals as well as small and medium-sized institutions on a world-wide basis, Arbatax said.
The bank is not engaged in commercial lending or real estate activities, Arbatax said.
The transaction is expected to be completed on or about January 31, 1997 and is subject to regulatory approval, the company said.
